stimulus.description: Array of image objects with parameters

coordinates.description: Object with x and y properties for absolute positioning

stimulus_duration.description: How long to show the stimulus for in milliseconds. If null, stimulus are shown until response.

response_ends_trial.description: If true, trial will end when user makes a response.

prompt.description: Any content here will be displayed below the stimulus.

choices.description: Keys that can be pressed to end the trial.

citations.apa: de Leeuw, J. R., Gilbert, R. A., & Luchterhandt, B. (2023). jsPsych: Enabling an Open-Source Collaborative Ecosystem of Behavioral Experiments. Journal of Open Source Software, 8(85), 5351. https://doi.org/10.21105/joss.05351
